doc.headline: Reese Witherspoon is pregnant!
doc.post: This makes me happier than it should for someone I don't know lol people.com
I too was very excited to read this today.
this makes me smile as well! :)

it's nice to see someone who is classy (or at least viewed that way), happily married (nothing wrong with single moms, but she's not in a crazy marriage like tom/katie or something) and not being paid to announce it for some tabloid. i'm happy for her too.
Aww, yay for her and her family!

it's nice to see someone who is classy (or at least viewed that way), happily married (nothing wrong with single moms, but she's not in a crazy marriage like tom/katie or something) and not being paid to announce it for some tabloid. i'm happy for her too.
Agreed! So excited for her and her husband! Can't wait to see what she has!
Another person happy and excited for her
I saw a picture of her in a short flowered dress and thought she had either put on wieght or is pregnant......happy for her.
I loved hearing this today - very happy for them!
Aw, that's awesome for her and her family.
I'm also very happy for her! Super excited to see a pregnant Reese again.
Good for her! But I was sad she got divorced and I was actually a Reese and Jake fan.
